quotes.q: What have you done today to make someone else happy?
quotes.h:
“What have you done today to make someone else happy?” —
Deepam Chaterjee

quotes.q: The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.
quotes.h:
“The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.” —
Jim Rohn

quotes.q: Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.
quotes.h:
“Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.” —
Unknown

quotes.q: I defeat my enemies when I make them my friends.
quotes.h:
“I defeat my enemies when I make them my friends.” —
Dalai Lama

quotes.q: All animals except man know that the principal business of life is to enjoy it.
quotes.h:
“All animals except man know that the principal business of life is to enjoy it.” —
Samuel Butler

quotes.q: Every day is lost in which we do not learn something useful. Man has no nobler or more valuable possession than time.
quotes.h:
“Every day is lost in which we do not learn something useful. Man has no nobler or more valuable possession than time.” —
Thomas Jefferson
